Class DataResponseImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.logitopia.jmortar.core.persistence.response.impl.DataResponseImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataResponse

    public final class DataResponseImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataResponse
    The DataResponseImpl class is an implementation of DataResponse that creates an immutable implementation.
